arts.ttl: Barcelona midfielder back in group training ahead of Valencia clash

The Blaugrana, having dropped points against Rayo Vallecano before the international break, will be hoping to bounce back to winning ways on Sunday. arts.ttl: Just in: Lamine Yamal misses training due to physical issues ahead of Barcelona vs Valencia
arts.sum: As FC Barcelona began their final preparations for the game against Valencia on Sunday, there was a notable absence from the training session at Ciutat Esportiva. Indeed, as confirmed by journalist Victor Navarro, Barcelona rising superstar Lamine Yamal did not take part in the team training today due to some physical issues. arts.ttl: Barcelona young forward awaits his debut against Valencia after patient wait
arts.sum: Roony Bardghji signed for FC Barcelona during the summer, arriving from FC Copenhagen in a deal worth over €2 million. arts.sum: Barcelona resume their competitive schedule this Sunday following the international break. arts.ttl: Everything ready at Estadi Johan Cruyff to host Barcelona vs Valencia
arts.sum: Barcelona play their first home game of the 2025/26 season this Sunday when they take on Valencia on Matchday 4 of La Liga. However, it will not be taking place at the Spotify Camp Nou and instead, the match will be played at the Catalans’ reserve stadium, Estadi Johan Cruyff.
